languages.text:
For each Daemonette nearby all creatures within their aura suffer:
<indent=5%>−10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
附近每有一名欲魔，所有在光环效果内的生物都会受到以下影响：
<indent=5%>−10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
Все существа в области действия ауры демонеток получают штрафы за каждую демонетку:
<indent=5%>−10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}</indent>
